name: Random who drink
description:
Does your party boring? Just grab your device and play this game! Random who drink
Random who drink is the board game to play Drinking Game. It will help you turn the party with friends into a fun activity!
You'll never have the same game twice, Random who drink is board game with change item at board every time when you play!

And if that's not enough, there are a lot of exciting cards for lucky draw card!

The game is not only awesome, it's also really easy to play.

The players take roll the dices and move player. The player then follows the written instructions on the board, and then the player hands the device to the next player, that's all there is to it!

This game is unlimited player and unlimited fun,

All you need for this drinking game is:
- The Players, who're ready for some fun!
- Favorite beverage such as Soda,Water,Sweetened beverage, Juice,etc.
- This Game "Random who drink".

The game features:
- Easy board game
- Lucky draw cards, each with unique task

Have fun!
